body.p:
Head-Quarters District ^Mil.^ of Kentucky,
OFFICE ASSISTANT COMMISSARY OF MUSTERS, Prov,, Mar,, Genl,,
Camp Nelson, Lexington Ky., Oct,, 3rd 1864.
Governor Bramlet,

Sir I have the honor to respectfully ask what officer of Co,, "C" 1st Ky,, Light Artillery have made application for promotion, and what one has applied for Captaincy. I am desirous of making an application myself and I wish to know what places have been applied for in the Company please answer by return mail, direct as above.

I am Governor
Very Respectfuy
Your Obdt,, Servt,,
E. W. Gould
Sergt,, Co,, "C." 1st Ky. Lt,, Arty,,

1
Head qrs Dist Mil. of Ky
Pro. Mar. Genls
Lexington Oct 3" 1864.
Gould E. W.
Sergt Co "C" 1" Ky. L. A.
To The Gov_
Asks what officers of Co "C" 1" Ky Light Arty have made application for promotion & who has applied for captaincy -- Desires making application himself and wants to know what places have been applied for --
L B No 7 -- 1864 P. 136
Recd A. G. O. Oct 3" 1864 --
